Articles.Content: Underlining AND embiggening the font size of a noun to emphasise a point!? First lesson at cheater-school.
Being a procrastinator? That's CHEATING!
Unionizing the Pacific? You must be the shop steward for the other cheaters on the West Coast. Us fair players are rewarded for merit, not seniority.
Being a shop steward? CHEATER!
Google stealing your stuff? AND in a warp ship around duna? DOUBLE CHEATER!

Having a steam name different than your forum name? Confusing cheating! Everyone knows it's easy to be reconized if you keep the same name!

Also, I'm super happy. This game has gotten to the point where I don't have to bump it to keep it going. But I'm still gonna play.

Pride in your own thread? Gimme a C! Gimme an H! Gimme an E! Gimme an A! Gimme a T! Gimme an E! Gimme an R! What have you got? YOU. Good posters never call attention to the success of their threads, no matter how good they are.

Changing your user title frequently, to a word that shares a rhyme with the orignal word? Cheating! I liked it better as just Flight Director cause now there's nobody directing flights. Only Lite Brites are getting directed.
Endermen can't be rocket scientists, they steal the parts! Cheater/Liar!

Endermen can't be rocket scientists, they steal the parts! Cheater/Liar!

You didn't explain. They steal parts to use for rockets.

Also, that's cheating to doubt Endermen, and also to doubt Endersmens!
Using a name and avatar related to a different community on a rocketry game? CHEATER!
Using a steam engine as conventional travel!Cheater!
Not looking back at the past? C H E A T E R ! ! ! ! ! !
not running on coal!!!! Cheater!
Criticizing the 844's use of recycled engine oil to preserve resources? CHEATER!!!!

Having a debate about trains in a thread about finding ways of calling people cheaters? Cheaters!

(as in, both you (mythbusters844), and MGUARN, are cheaters)
Knowing what this thread is about?! CHEATER!
Bumping an old thread!? Only cheaters do that, Cheater!
Posting that a thread is old is cheating.
Being a kerbal? CHEATER!
Troll! CHEATER!!!!!
No avatar! CHEATER!!!!!!!!!
No rep? Only cheaters have no reputation! Cheater!

Discriminating against low rep?

CHEATER!

Having no avatar and calling someone else a cheater?

CHEATER!
